plotKML 0.8-3

GPS log of a bike tour

gpxbtour.Rd

GPS log of a bike tour from Wageningen (the Netherlands) to MÃ¼nster (Germany). The table contains 3228 records of GPS locations, speed and elevation.

data(gpxbtour)

Format

The data frame contains the following columns:

lon

longitude (x-coordinate)

lat

latitude (y-coordinate)

ele

GPS-estimated elevation in m

speed

GPS-estimated speed in km per hour

time

XML Schema time

Author

Tomislav Hengl

Note

The log was produced using the GlobalSat GH-615 GPS watch. The original data log (trackpoints) was first saved to GPX exchange format (https://www.topografix.com/gpx.asp) and then imported to R using the XML package and formatted to a data frame.

Examples

if (FALSE) ## load the data:
data(gpxbtour)
library(sp)
## format the time column:
gpxbtour$ctime <- as.POSIXct(gpxbtour$time, format="%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ")
#> Error in as.POSIXct(gpxbtour$time, format = "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ"): object 'gpxbtour' not found
coordinates(gpxbtour) <- ~lon+lat
#> Error in coordinates(gpxbtour) <- ~lon + lat: object 'gpxbtour' not found
proj4string(gpxbtour) <- CRS("+proj=longlat +datum=WGS84")
#> Error in proj4string(gpxbtour) <- CRS("+proj=longlat +datum=WGS84"): object 'gpxbtour' not found
## convert to a STTDF class:
library(spacetime)
library(adehabitatLT)
#> Error in library(adehabitatLT): there is no package called 'adehabitatLT'
gpx.ltraj <- as.ltraj(coordinates(gpxbtour), gpxbtour$ctime, id = "th")
#> Error in as.ltraj(coordinates(gpxbtour), gpxbtour$ctime, id = "th"): could not find function "as.ltraj"
gpx.st <- as(gpx.ltraj, "STTDF")
#> Error in .class1(object): object 'gpx.ltraj' not found
## Google maps plot:
library(RgoogleMaps)
llc <- c(mean(gpx.st@sp@bbox[2,]), mean(gpx.st@sp@bbox[1,]))
#> Error in h(simpleError(msg, call)): error in evaluating the argument 'x' in selecting a method for function 'mean': object 'gpx.st' not found
MyMap <- GetMap.bbox(center=llc, zoom=8, destfile="map.png")
#> Error in GetMap.bbox(center = llc, zoom = 8, destfile = "map.png"): object 'llc' not found
PlotOnStaticMap(MyMap, lat=gpx.st@sp@coords[,2], lon=gpx.st@sp@coords[,1], 
  FUN=lines, col="black", lwd=4)
#> Error in PlotOnStaticMap(MyMap, lat = gpx.st@sp@coords[, 2], lon = gpx.st@sp@coords[,     1], FUN = lines, col = "black", lwd = 4): object 'MyMap' not found
